name: LinkedIn People & Company Enrichment API
description: Extract LinkedIn profiles, company data, employee lists, and people search via mobile proxy. Replaces LinkedIn Sales Navigator ($80-150/mo) with micropayments.
longDescription: Full LinkedIn data enrichment: extract person profiles (experience, education, skills), company pages (size, industry, funding), search people by keywords/title/company, and list company employees. Mobile proxies bypass LinkedIn's aggressive anti-scraping that blocks all datacenter IPs within seconds.
whyMobileProxy: LinkedIn is one of the most aggressively protected platforms. It blocks all datacenter IPs, fingerprints browser sessions, and rate-limits even residential proxies to ~100 requests/day. Mobile carrier IPs appear as legitimate LinkedIn app users (iOS/Android), bypassing these protections. This is the gold standard for LinkedIn scraping — even competitors like ProxyCurl use mobile proxy infrastructure internally.

vs.name: ProxyCurl
vs.limitation: Person profiles only, no employee lists, no search

vs.name: LinkedIn Sales Navigator
vs.limitation: Manual use only, no API, 2500 searches/mo

vs.name: PhantomBuster LinkedIn
vs.limitation: Requires your LinkedIn session cookie, risk of ban

competitive.ourAdvantage: Full LinkedIn data (profiles, companies, search, employees) at $0.03-0.10/request. No LinkedIn login required. No monthly commitment. No risk to your LinkedIn account.

limitations: Private profiles return limited public data only
Employee lists limited to publicly visible employees
Rate limited to 20 proxy requests/minute per client IP
LinkedIn may vary data shown by region/language
Search results limited to LinkedIn's non-authenticated view depth

/api/linkedin/person.description: Get person profile: experience, education, skills, certifications

/api/linkedin/company.description: Get company profile: size, industry, specialties, description

/api/linkedin/search/people.description: Search people by keywords, title, company, location

/api/linkedin/company/:id/employees.description: List employees of a company with titles
